name: 4Med Mobile Vitals Diary
description: Our vitals tracking app allows patients to keep track of their health information and store it securely online and supports more than 100 wireless medical devices. Tracks Blood Pressure, Blood Glucose, Heart Rate, Weight, Temperature, Blood Oxygen, ECG, Spirometry and Medication Adherence.

name: Batz guide for patient safety
description: Each year, preventable medical errors take the lives of almost 200,000 Americans making it the third leading cause of death in the United States. (Healthgrades 2004) On April 14, 2009, my mom, Louise Batz, went to have knee replacement surgery. That night, a medical error caused Mom to sustain an injury from which she could not recover

name: Cake Health
description: Brings all your health care plans together online so you can easily track your health spending — without the paperwork.

name: CareSync
description: Easy-to-use web, iOS, and Android applications make it incredibly simple to access and share your health information. The power of data finally gets personal.

name: CareZone
description: Add medications just with pictures. Connect with physicians

name: CORAlink
description: An emergency app that stores emergency lifesaving information such as profile, blood type, allergies and medications.

name: CORAvault
description: Carry an always up-to-date health record, manage appointments, share records in a secure manner, and manage medications and allergies.

name: Datuit
description: Accurately and conveniently communicate with all of your clinicians and caregivers at the same time.

name: emrAnyWhere
description: emrAnyWhere enables patients and providers to manage care delivery. With the providers defining the regimen & goals and the patient providing real-time details on their vitals, health measures & medication compliance, emrAnyWhere takes the Patient Engagement to a whole new level.

name: FollowMyHealth
description: Empowers patients to take a more active role in managing their care.

name: GenieMD
description: GenieMD easily tracks, securely stores and conveniently shares your health profile from the palm of your hand.

name: HealthCenter
description: HealthCenter is an MU-certified patient portal and personal health record that puts health information in the hands of patients. Patients use HC to manage and control their health information from one easy-to-use site. Health records can be electronically and securely exchanged and consolidated into a single patient record.

name: Healthjump
description: Healthjump is an online health exchange enabling doctor-to-patient and doctor-to-doctor communication on a secure platform. Patient benefits include consolidating their health record, managing multiple accounts from one login, requesting appointments, and paying copays.

name: Healthmemo
description: HealthMemo is a smart solution free app to upload and maintain health records electronically. Maintaining all paper documents is tedious and it is not possible to carry them around at all times. Digital copies (soft copies) of these documents are rarely provided by the hospitals/clinics. The app is designed to bridge this gap with the help of the ubiquitous mobile phone.

name: Healthspek
description: Your personal and family health record with your own actionable speks.

name: Healthvault
description: A trusted place for people to gather, store, use, and share health information online.

name: Hello Doctor
description: Helps you manage and understand your medical records, and makes it easy to share them with your doctor, for free.

name: Hello Heart
description: Hello Heart empowers people to take control of their health. You can easily manage all of your medical data, track blood pressure and understand if your BP or cholesterol levels are too high. It has built in notification to track your BP and simple reassuring explanations that help you understand your medical data and always feel calm and in control.

name: iBlueButton
description: Easily and securely access, store and share your Medicare, VA, Tricare and other Blue Button records with your physicians directly from your smartphone or tablet.

name: ICEBlueButton
description: ICEBlueButton allows anyone to easily create an ICE (In Case of Emergency) record on their smartphone for themselves and their loved ones.

name: iShare Medical Records
description: Consolidates all of your medical records into a single shared up-to-date medical record.

name: Kinsights
description: Create your child's health record

name: Medfusion Plus
description:
Simplify your family's healthcare.

Medfusion Plus:
1. Imports your health records from your doctors
2. It organizes it and automatically keeps it up to date
3. It lets you manage your whole family together

name: Medisafe
description: Keep yourself and loved ones safe and never forget to take your meds again with Medisafe, the easy-to-use and FREE app ranked #1 by pharmacists to help you remember when to take your pills.

name: Medyear
description: Medyear is a universal health record that empowers individual users to truly take charge of their health journey.  It gathers all of their health and medical data in one place in an easy-to-understand, story-like format on their mobile devices.

name: My911 Health
description: Pre and Post Emergency service along with Health and Wellness monitoring.

name: myBlueHub
description: myBlueHub empowers patients to collect, manage and share their health information in a simple to use application. myBlueHub connects patients with their families, care givers and providers and allows data to move securely through the system.

name: MyChartCentral / Lucy
description: With MyChartCentral, patients don’t need to remember a handful of passwords and visit multiple web sites looking for their medical data: It can all be found in one place.\r\n\r\nWith Lucy, patients can enter information about their own health that can then be sent to the patients’ healthcare providers.

name: MyFamily
description: Lyfechannel helps patients build the dietary, physical activity and prescription drug adherence habits to meet their chronic disease demands

name: Myphr.com
description: Visit AHIMA’s PHR website, myphr.com, to learn more about owning your health information. Here you will find information on how to create a PHR, resources on health literacy, and helpful links, such as PHR news stories, a PHR video library, and a medical identity theft response checklist.

name: MyQuest by Care360
description: MyQuest allows you to get your Quest Diagnostics lab test results sent directly to your account and is accessible from your mobile or Web-enabled device. MyQuest also allows you to view, store, and share other vital health information. Life is complicated. Managing your health shouldn't be.

name: Navigating Cancer
description: Empowering cancer survivors and healthcare professionals to improve the quality and efficiency of care.

name: NoMoreClipboard
description: Securely organize, update, access and share medical information online. Free NoMoreClipboard Personal Health Records are Better. Managed.

name: Patient Gateway
description: Liberating your health record. Now you can easily understand and manage your total health.

name: Prime
description: Prime lets you automatically get your health records from any doctor and allows you to easily access and use your personal health info anywhere you go.

name: RelayHealth
description: RelayHealth is a pioneer in supporting patient access to health information and enabling seamless patient centered interoperability across disparate vendor platforms. RelayHealth was an early BlueButton innovator and winner of VA's BlueButton for all Americans contest.

name: Swellbox
description: Swellbox brings your health information together.

name: Well
description: Well collects all of your health records and places it in a single App.  With your health data in a single App, it's easy to understand and manage your health with actions based on the data you are collecting!

name: WellnessFX
description: Own your personal health data - all your historical lab data displayed beautifully and simply, with the click of a button.

name: Empower
description: Empower is selected by many prestigious, patient-centered provider organizations for its innovative patient engagement capabilities and comprehensive collaborative health record.
